description:
USN-5293-1 fixed a vulnerability in c3p0.
This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 Aaron Massey discovered that c3p0 could be made to crash when
 parsing certain input. An attacker able to modify the application's
 XML configuration file could cause a denial of service.
title: c3p0 vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: c3p0 could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted file.
